ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to prevent user from updating the status to "Canceled" when Status <>Draft, Created, Assigned or when the "Reason for cancellation" is empty. This will prevent user from doing updates
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"Draft"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"Assigned"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"Created")), ISBLANK(CH_ReasonForCancellation__c), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Cancelled"), CH_RecordTypeCheck__c, OR(CH_RecordTypeDevName__c != 'CH_Problem',(CH_RecordTypeDevName__c = 'CH_Problem')&& ISPICKVAL(Status,"Cancelled")&& ISPICKVAL( CH_Stage__c ,"Close") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Can not Cancel Case when Initial Response milestone is not completed
